content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?> <sos:Capabilities xmlns:oost='http://www.oostethys.org/schemas/0.1.0/oostethys' xmlns:xsi='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance' xmlns:ows='http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' xmlns:gml='http://www.opengis.net/gml' xmlns:swe='http://www.opengis.net/swe/1.0' xmlns:sos='http://www.opengis.net/sos/1.0' xsi:schemaLocation='http://www.opengis.net/sos/1.0 http://schemas.opengis.net/sos/1.0.0/sosGetCapabilities.xsd' version='1.0.0'>     <!--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-->     <!-- Service Identification -->     <!--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-->     <ows:ServiceIdentification>         <ows:Title>Louisiana Universities Marine Consortium (LUMCON) SOS</ows:Title>         <ows:Abstract/>         <ows:Keywords1>    <ows:Keyword>Ocean Observation</ows:Keyword>         </ows:Keywords1>         <ows:ServiceType codeSpace='http://opengeospatial.net'>OGC:SOS</ows:ServiceType>         <ows:ServiceTypeVersion>1.0.0</ows:ServiceTypeVersion>         <ows:Fees>NONE</ows:Fees>         <ows:AccessConstraints>NONE</ows:AccessConstraints>     </ows:ServiceIdentification>     <!--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-->     <!-- Provider Description -->     <!--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-->     <ows:ServiceProvider>         <ows:ProviderName>Louisiana Universities Marine Consortium</ows:ProviderName>         <ows:ProviderSite xlink:href='http://weather.lumcon.edu/'/>         <ows:ServiceContact>             <ows:IndividualName>Holly Hebert</ows:IndividualName>             <ows:PositionName>Public Information Specialist</ows:PositionName>             <ows:ContactInfo>                 <ows:Phone>                     <ows:Voice>(985) 851 2842</ows:Voice>                 </ows:Phone>                 <ows:Address>                     <ows:DeliveryPoint>8124 Hwy 56</ows:DeliveryPoint>                     <ows:City>Chauvin, LA</ows:City>                     <ows:AdministrativeArea/>                     <ows:PostalCode>70344</ows:PostalCode>                     <ows:Country></ows:Country>                     <ows:ElectronicMailAddress>infotech@lumcon.edu</ows:ElectronicMailAddress>                 </ows:Address>             </ows:ContactInfo>         </ows:ServiceContact>     </ows:ServiceProvider>     <!--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-->     <!-- operations Metadata Section -->     <!--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-->     <ows:OperationsMetadata>         <ows:Operation name='GetCapabilities'>             <ows:DCP>                 <ows:HTTP>                    <ows:Get xlink:href='http://weather.lumcon.edu/sos/oostethys_server.asp'/>                    <ows:Post xlink:href='http://weather.lumcon.edu/sos/oostethys_server.asp'/>                 </ows:HTTP>             </ows:DCP>             <ows:Parameter name='service'>                 <ows:AllowedValues>                     <ows:Value>SOS</ows:Value>                 </ows:AllowedValues>             </ows:Parameter>             <ows:Parameter name='version'>                 <ows:AllowedValues>                     <ows:Value>1.0.0</ows:Value>                 </ows:AllowedValues>            </ows:Parameter>         </ows:Operation>         <ows:Operation name='GetObservation'>             <ows:DCP>                 <ows:HTTP>                     <ows:Get xlink:href='http://weather.lumcon.edu/sos/oostethys_server.asp'/>                     <ows:Post xlink:href='http://weather.lumcon.edu/sos/oostethys_server.asp'/>                 </ows:HTTP>             </ows:DCP>             <ows:Parameter name='offering'>                 <ows:AllowedValues>      <ows:Value>101</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>102</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>103</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>104</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>105</ows:Value>                 </ows:AllowedValues>             </ows:Parameter>             <ows:Parameter name='eventTime'>                 <ows:AnyValue/>             </ows:Parameter>             <ows:Parameter name='observedProperty'>                 <ows:AllowedValues>      <ows:Value>air_pressure</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>air_temperature</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>dissolved_oxygen</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>relative_humidity</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>salinity</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>downward_shortwave_radiation</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>surface_elevation</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>water_temperature</ows:Value>      <ows:Value>wind_speed</ows:Value>                 </ows:AllowedValues>             </ows:Parameter>         </ows:Operation>         <ows:Operation name='DescribeSensor'>          <ows:DCP>           <ows:HTTP>            <ows:Get xlink:href='http://weather.lumcon.edu/sos/oostethys_server.asp' />             <ows:Post xlink:href='http://weather.lumcon.edu/sos/oostethys_server.asp' />            </ows:HTTP>          </ows:DCP>          <ows:Parameter name='procedure'>           <ows:AllowedValues>             <ows:Value>urn:disl.org:source.mooring#disl</ows:Value>              <ows:Value>urn:disl.org:source.mooring#mbla</ows:Value>              <ows:Value>urn:disl.org:source.mooring#mhpa</ows:Value>             </ows:AllowedValues>            </ows:Parameter>          </ows:Operation>     </ows:OperationsMetadata>     <!--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-->     <!-- Observation Offerings -->     <!--~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~-->     <sos:Contents>         <sos:ObservationOfferingList>    <sos:ObservationOffering xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' gml:id='101'>    <gml:description>Data from Marine Center Station</gml:description> <gml:upperCorner>29.25333 -90.66333 0.0</gml:upperCorner>      </gml:Envelope>     </gml:boundedBy>     <sos:eventTime>      <gml:TimePeriod gml:id='101_valid_times'>       <gml:beginPosition indeterminatePosition='unknown'>2003-02-24T15:00:00Z</gml:beginPosition>       <gml:endPosition indeterminatePosition='now'/>       <gml:timeInterval unit='hour'>0.5</gml:timeInterval>      </gml:TimePeriod>     </sos:eventTime>     <sos:procedure xlink:href='urn:x-ioos:def:station:lumcon::101'/>     <sos:observedProperty xlink:href='http://mmisw.org/cf#air_pressure'/>
